name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: WDYT? - What Do You Think - Rating System

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Evaluate in real-time using P2P connections

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Instantly rate and gather feedback during online meetings or livestreams. This extension allows participants to provide real-time ratings on a scale of 1-5, helping organizers engagement and improve meeting effectiveness or get viewer's opinions. 

One-click meeting ratings or poll
Real-time average rating display
Peer-to-peer technology for privacy and security
